## Properties

| Property  | Attribute  | Description                                                                           | Type      | Default |
| --------- | ---------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `asImage` | `as-image` | When set to true, the diagram won't be interactive but it will displayed as an image. | `boolean` | `false` |
